description.value:
You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Poison Weapon]{Poison Weapon}, the poison deals [[/r 2d4[poison]]] damage instead of [[/r 1d4[poison]]] damage. You don't waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feat-effects.Effect: Improved Poison Weapon]{Effect: Improved Poison Weapon}
